identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a Paperless Transaction System that feels like a high-performance financial terminal mixed with a modern email client. No boring 'corporate gray' slop. Optimize for density, speed, and clarity.
principles: Fusion: Financial Terminal density + Consumer Email fluidity
Content: Data is the interface. Minimize decorative containers.
Negative Space: Use it to separate contexts (Nav vs List vs Detail).
anti_patterns: Purple/Teal primary buttons (Use deep indigo or electric blue)
Generic 'Inter' headings (Use Manrope or Plus Jakarta Sans)

buttons.primary: rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-md bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 focus:border-blue-500 rounded-md

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'corporate' gradients. Use solid colors or subtle mesh gradients.
Ensure the sidebar is dark mode (slate-900) while the main content is light mode.
Use 1px borders to separate panels, not heavy shadows.
For the approval workflow, visualize it as a horizontal chain of nodes.
Data density is key in the middle list panel. Don't use massive padding there.
The Detail panel should look like a printed document on a desk (clean, white, structured).

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Setup global CSS to use Manrope/Inter fonts.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Create the 'Shell' layout (Sidebar, Resizable Panels for List/Detail).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Implement the 'Request Card' component for the middle list (compact, showing status, date, title).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'Approval Chain' component using Lucide icons and connector lines.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Ensure mobile responsiveness: On mobile, 3 panels become a navigation stack.
